description: This file defines the root layout and app component for a Remix.run web application. It imports necessary components from '@remix-run/react' and '@remix-run/node', sets up link tags for styles and fonts, and renders the main app structure including meta tags, links, and outlet for nested routes.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that defines the overall HTML structure, including head elements and body content

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component rendering the nested route outlet
